description:
It hurts... it hurts so much...  Wooser is in great pain staring at a blank white sheet of paper.  His deadline is coming but he`s too hung over to think of anything.  He wasn`t just being lazy, though, he was drinking all night with the sponsers to keep from running out of money.  WIll Wooser be able to overcome the evil within himself and meet his deadline?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: うーさー先生, 締め切りとの戦い
